Row.Text: Castle Doctrine

People are assembling at the gates of your Castle keeps and demanding safety during this time of war. Your castles are not large enough to accommodate entire cities, so you must decide. Who should be given access to the keep during war?
Our most skilled craftsmen according to their merit.
For {4_Turns}, all Castles produce +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production but lose 1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
Our finest merchants if they can afford the tax.
For {4_Turns}, all Castles produce +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production but lose 2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
We have a duty to our citizens!
For {4_Turns}, all Castles produce +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
The clergy as it is willed by God.
For {4_Turns}, all Castles produce +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith but lose 2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
A Question of Hygiene

As the popularity of bathing continues to rise, so too does demand. Citizens in your empire demand additional baths; however, elites and aristocrats protest this, stating that baths are a luxury. Your advisors need your input on this. How do you feel?
The unwashed masses should remain unwashed.
Receive a free Great Person of your choice.
Spare no expense - the people shall be clean!
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in all Cities. All Baths cost an additional 3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Encourage people to find other means of getting clean.
Aqueducts in all Cities: +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Foreign Aid
Our country is having a real rough time. I suggest to swallow our pride and appeal for foreign aid and charity money.
Let's try to get whatever we can, even if it worsens our reputation.
{1_YieldCost}. {2_InstantYield}
We will get out of this ourselves.
Gain nothing.
